mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_id, user_pswd, user_jbps, user_nm, user_type, user_ogdp, user_eml, user_telno, user_dp_nm FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into users ( user_no, user_id, user_pswd, user_jbps, user_nm, user_type, user_ogdp, user_eml, user_telno, user_dp_nm ) values (user_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{userPswd}, #{userJbps}, #{userNm}, #{userType}, #{userOgdp}, #{userEml}, #{userTelno}, #{userDpNm} )
